title: Bare Land for Sale in Trincomalee.
details:
Flat rectangular shaped 145.3 Perches bare land situated at Salli Sampalthivu in Trincomalee District. Just 400 meters from beach front and about 9 to 12 Kms away from the Nilaweli and Trincomalee Towns respectively.

All amenities are available such as electricity water etc.

Very close to famous Salli Amman Kovil Temple. 5 km from Colombo Trincomalee main road and regular public transport facilities are available towards Nilaweli & Trincomalee.

Suitable for a Hotel , Wedding hall & Super market construction. This is a free hold land
with a high density residential area and a calm and quiet surrounding with a decent neighborhood. These lands are occupied by higher income families of Trincomalee.

All the documents in order.
